name: Cloud Elements
description: Cloud Elements was built to simplify cloud application integrations and enable application developers to deliver “Cooperative Apps”. We use a “one-to-many” approach to connect your application with entire categories of cloud applications, each through a single API. Our clients include startups, SaaS vendors and departments of enterprises who want to provide their customers with more integration options, faster and for a fraction of the cost. Our awesome team is rapidly building connections to the most popular cloud applications that your customers are using. After just one year in business, we were named APEX Technology Startup of 2013. Cloud Elements is based in Denver, Colorado, but our business reaches customers worldwide.
